title: CNN law enforcement analysts on what's next in Idaho investigation
description: CNN Chief Law Enforcement and Intelligence Analyst John Miller and CNN Senior Law Enforcement Analyst Andrew McCabe break down what's next in the investigation into the killings of four University of Idaho students following the arrest of a suspect in connection with the killings.

title: North Korea fires at least one unidentified ballistic missile
description: North Korea fired at least one unidentified ballistic missile into the waters off the east coast of the Korean Peninsula on Saturday, according to South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff, the latest in an unprecedented year of weapons testing.

title: Retired general: A weak Russia would be satisfying for Xi
description: Former NATO Supreme Allied Commander Gen. Wesley Clark (ret.) explains the strategic relationship between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping during Russia's war in Ukraine.

title: Keep an eye on the sky for 2023's celestial events
description: Stunning meteor showers, full moons and eclipses will light up the sky in 2023.

title: Trump wanted to trademark 'Rigged Election!' and other key findings from latest Jan. 6 panel release
description: The House January 6 committee on Friday released another wave of witness interview transcripts.

title: Bolsonaro leaves Brazil for US ahead of Lula's inauguration
description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro left Brazil for the United States on Friday, according to CNN Brasil, two days before the inauguration of his successor, President-elect Luiz Inácio "Lula" da Silva.

title: From 'Avatar' to 'Everything Everywhere All at Once': The scene-stealers of 2022
description: As 2022 comes to an end, there is much to look back and reflect on, including those moments in film and television when an actor gave us pause, wowed us or downright destroyed us. Those moments and performances, stick with us long after the story ends, oftentimes registering on a deeply personal level.

title: How Vivienne Westwood dressed the Sex Pistols and shaped punk
description: With some help from the Sex Pistols, British youths hungry for anarchy, and influences including Teddy Boy subculture and fetishists, Vivienne Westwood helped develop punk as a style, an ethos and a movement.

title: See six years of Trump's tax returns
See six years of Trump's tax returns
Don't let phone notifications stress you out. Here's how
description: A ping from the pizza company. A couple of pings from your socials. Ping, ping, ping from your family WhatsApp group trying to organize a weekend gathering.

title: Stocks are having their worst year since 2008. Bonds are even worse
description: Wall Street is bidding goodbye -- and good riddance -- to 2022. It has been a year most investors would rather forget.

title: Hindu woman's mutilated body found in Pakistan
Suspect in custody in connection with killings of 4 University of Idaho students
description: [Breaking news update, published at 11:32 a.m. ET]

title: See how fireworks are installed on one of the world's tallest towers
description: For the past 18 years spectators have gathered to see the fireworks display at Taipei's tallest building. CNN gets an exclusive look at the installation process.

title: Bankruptcy, fame and prison: The rise and fall of Todd and Julie Chrisley
description: In the 2014 premiere of "Chrisley Knows Best," Atlanta real estate tycoon Todd Chrisley gives the cameras a tour of his pristinely organized closet, bragging that his family spends about $300,000 a year "sometimes more" on clothing alone.

title: The year that brought Silicon Valley back down to earth
description: On the first trading day of 2022, Apple hit a new milestone for the tech industry: the iPhone maker became the first publicly traded company to hit a $3 trillion market cap, with Microsoft and Google not far behind. As eye-popping as that valuation was, there were headlines speculating about how long it would be before Apple and its rivals topped $5 trillion.

title: Hear how Trump responded to release of his taxes
description: CNN's Kristen Holmes breaks down what we've learned so far after Democrats released former President Donald Trump's tax returns to the public.

title: Trump's tax returns are now public
Britain's royal family had a rollercoaster year
description: The writing was on the wall. Family reunions, legal troubles, fractured relationships and exiled royals -- it was always going to be a tough 12 months for the House of Windsor. But nothing could have prepared Britain's royal family for the realities of the past year and the seismic shifts it has endured.

title: 'I don't think it's helpful': Former IRS commissioner disagrees with Trump tax returns release
description: Six years of former President Donald Trump's federal tax returns, long shrouded in secrecy, were released to the public by the House Ways and Means Committee. Former IRS commissioner Mark Everson talks to CNN about the release.

title: 'Paul T. Goldman' blends fiction and reality in a way that's as odd as it is funny
description: The term "hybrid" is thrown around too loosely in entertainment, but it genuinely applies to "Paul T. Goldman," a Peacock series from the director of the "Borat" sequel that combines fiction with sort-of reality, scripted with a behind-the-scenes "making of" docuseries. Quirky and odd, the show's main point feels like the fact we're all the heroes of our story, at least in our own highly subjective eyes.

title: Controversial internet personality Andrew Tate and his brother detained in Romania
description: Controversial internet personality Andrew Tate and his brother were detained in Romania on Thursday, according to their defense lawyer.

title: Six years of Trump's tax returns are now public
description: Six years of former President Donald Trump's federal tax returns, long shrouded in secrecy, were released to the public on Friday by the House Ways and Means committee, the culmination of a battle over their disclosure that went to the Supreme Court.

title: Indian maker of cough syrup linked to Uzbekistan deaths halts production
description: The Indian maker of a cough syrup linked to at least 18 deaths in Uzbekistan has halted production after an investigation by drug regulators, India's health minister said Friday.

title: The Times Square ball drop has been a New York tradition for over 100 years
description: Welcoming a new year in Times Square wouldn't be the same without the famous ball drop. CNN explores the history of this eye-catching ritual.

title: 2022: A year the Royal Family will not forget
description: A year that will be remembered as seismic for Britain and the Royal Family, CNN's Max Foster looks back at a year of unprecedented events involving the Royals.

title: He flew to India for New Year's Eve and met the love of his life
description: For medical school student Nikhil, that New Year's Eve was emotional, cathartic and unexpected.

title: Man breaks into school and shelters nearly a dozen people from blizzard
description: As a deadly and historic blizzard barreled through Erie County, New York, last weekend, some residents found themselves in a dire scenario -- stranded in howling snow with nowhere to go, their cars dwindling in gas supply with police unable to come to the rescue.

title: 'The brink of disaster': 2023 is a critical year for the Colorado River as reservoirs sink toward 'dead pool'
description: Deep uncertainty looms over the Colorado River and the 40 million people who depend on it for their water supply as the basin enters a critical year that could determine its future stability.

title: Wall Street kills its darlings
description: Verbose writers afflicted with the tendency to deliver copy well above their requested word count are often advised by editors to kill their darlings -- to throw out large swaths of stories that they're particularly fond of.

title: How to beat that New Year's hangover before it starts
description: Toasting the birth of the new year is an age-old ritual, and for many, so is that dreaded morning aftermath — a hangover.

title: 2022 ends with looming risk of a new coronavirus variant, health experts warn
description: As the world enters a new year, many public health and infectious disease experts predict that monitoring for new coronavirus variants will be an increasingly important part of Covid-19 mitigation efforts -- and some are turning their attention to a surge in cases in China.

title: Who decides cause of death? It may be a business owner -- or an 18-year-old
description: When a group of physicians gathered in Washington state for an annual meeting, one made a startling revelation: If you ever want to know when, how — and where — to kill someone, I can tell you, and you'll get away with it. No problem.

title: What made Pelé so great
description: • Opinion: Pelé is gone, but his magic will live forever

title: Brazilian soccer legend Pelé dies at 82
Mayhem and mischief: How tourists behaved badly in 2022
description: In 2022, the world started traveling again -- and with that came the return of all the usual misbehavior and antics abroad. But with nerves perhaps frayed by a record year for airline cancellations, delays, lost luggage and inflated prices, misconduct was a particularly strong theme. Here are the standout moments from a year of travelers behaving badly.

title: Hindu woman's mutilated body found in Pakistan
description: The mutilated body of a Hindu woman was found in a field Thursday in southeastern Pakistan, police said, as they investigate her alleged murder in the latest suspected attack against minorities in the Muslim-majority country.

title: Pritzker-prize winning architect Arata Isozaki has died at the age of 91
description: Pritzker-prize winning architect Arata Isozaki has died at the age of 91, according to his longtime partner Misa Shin. He passed away due to natural causes on Wednesday at his home in Naha, in Japan's Okinawa prefecture. In a statement from his office, Arata Isozaki and Associates, Shin said that a private funeral service would be held with only close relatives present.

title: How did that Southwest meltdown happen? Insiders point to outdated tech
description: Ask Southwest Airlines employees about their company's technology, and one word keeps coming up: "antiquated."

title: Dania Akeel: Meet the Saudi woman taking on one of the world's toughest motor races
description: Her head cradled in a crash helmet, Dania Akeel's voice crackles through the intercom above the roar of the engine and the rush of wind through the windowless cabin of her rugged, black UTV.

title: Ukrainian forces face 'heavy losses' in Bakhmut and Soledar, presidential adviser says
Xi and Putin to speak via video as grinding Ukraine war tests China-Russia partnership
India cricket star Rishabh Pant injured in car accident
description: India international cricketer Rishabh Pant has been hospitalized after he was injured in a car accident in the northern state of Uttarakhand on Friday.

title: Russian attacks on eastern Ukrainian cities 'smack of desperation, reminiscent of suicide bombers,' a Ukrainian presidential adviser said
description: Explosions rattled villages and cities across Ukraine on Thursday in what Kyiv has called one of Moscow's largest missile barrages since the war began in February. Follow here for live updates.

title: The best books of 2022, according to cultural tastemakers
description: If you've reached the end of the year feeling as though you didn't read enough, we've got you. Here are some of the best books of the year according to notable authors, artists, image-makers and other cultural tastemakers.

title: Ukrainian forces face 'heavy losses' in Bakhmut and Soledar, presidential adviser says
description: Explosions rattled villages and cities across Ukraine on Thursday in what Kyiv has called one of Moscow's largest missile barrages since the war began in February. Follow here for live updates.

title: Myanmar court extends Aung San Suu Kyi's prison sentence to 33 years
description: A court in military-run Myanmar has sentenced Aung San Suu Kyi to seven years in prison for corruption, a source familiar with the case told CNN, bringing an end to a string of secretive and highly-politicized proceedings against the ousted former leader.

title: Chinese travelers are ready to go overseas again. Some countries are hesitant
Xi and Putin to speak via video as grinding Ukraine war tests China-Russia partnership
description: Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin are scheduled to speak Friday via video conference, the Kremlin said, with analysts watching for any sign of a softening in the Chinese leader's support for the Russian president after more than 10 months of war in Ukraine and as China faces an unprecedented Covid outbreak.

title: Release of Trump's federal tax returns ushers in a charged new era of presidential oversight
description: House Democrats are set to release former President Donald Trump's federal tax returns Friday morning, ushering in a charged new era of presidential oversight.

title: China has abandoned its zero-Covid policy. What will the economy look like in 2023?
description: As China moves ever closer to fully reemerging from three years of government-imposed Covid isolation and reintegrating with the world, economic expectations are high.

title: Buffalo pastors rescued more than 100 people during historic blizzard
2 dead after rockfall in Yosemite National Park, sheriff says
description: Two people are dead after a rockfall occurred Tuesday at Yosemite National Park in Northern California, the Mariposa County Sheriff's Office told CNN.

title: McCarthy offers his critics a key concession in effort to clinch House speakership
description: House Republican Leader Kevin McCarthy has offered a key concession to critics of his bid for the House speakership during private conversations this week: reducing the threshold that is required to force a floor vote on ousting the sitting speaker, according to six Republican sources familiar with the internal discussions.

title: Watch: Texas woman stores hundreds of 'cold-stunned' bats in her attic
description: More than a thousand 'cold-stunned' bats were rescued by the Houston Humane Society in Texas, after falling off bridges in frigid weather.

title: Video: Professional figure skater recreates iconic 'Wednesday' dance
description: Olympian Kamila Valieva recreated Jenny Ortega's dance in Netflix's hit show 'Wednesday' while competing in the Russian Figure Skating Championships.

title: Biden signs $1.7 trillion government spending bill into law
description: President Joe Biden on Thursday signed a $1.7 trillion federal spending bill that includes a number of administration priorities and officially avoids a government shutdown, ending what he called a "year of historic progress."

title: The most overlooked titles of 2022 in movies, TV, music, books and more
description: This was a doozy of a year, admittedly made even more overwhelming by the ever-expanding glut of content you know you want to consume.
